name: Wallace & Gromit's Grand Adventures Episode 3 - Muzzled!
name_original: Wallace & Gromit's Grand Adventures Episode 3 - Muzzled!
description:
Wallace & Gromit's Grand Adventures Episode 3 - Muzzled! is an adventure game developed by Telltale Games. It came out on 16-06-2009. Telltale Games published the game. The game is rated as "Recommended" on RAWG.
You can play Wallace & Gromit's Grand Adventures Episode 3 - Muzzled! on iOS, PC and Xbox 360.
